title: Charting the Lost Continent: Poetry and Other Discoveries
description: Revealing, relatable, and provocative, the interior recesses of a fully-lived life are laid bare in Charting the Lost Continent. Here the reader finds connection through a deeply moving examination of the human experience, womanhood, and the arc of one individualâ€™s life. This poetry collection is a homecoming; a contemplative garden in which to linger.
author: Linda Albert
